## Material/Surface information file "mat_scene10" ('Medium room')

Author: 					Lukas Asp√∂ck / las@akustik.rwth-aachen.de
Date:						2016/07/11	

Notes:						This file contains information about the boundary conditions of the materials (6):
							"mat_scene10_floor", "mat_scene10_seating", "mat_scene10_plaster", "mat_scene10_ceiling", "mat_scene10_stagePanels", "mat_scene10_structuredPlaster"
														
							All relevant values are given in separate files in the csv-format							


## Material information:

Scenes:						10
Origin of data: 			Estimated data for absorption and scattering coefficients (based on database values and in situ measurements)
Angle of incidence:			random incidence
Frequency Range:			20 Hz - 20 kHz (31 third octave values, see line 1 in csv file)	

Absorption coefficients:	[x] (see line 2 in csv file)
Scattering coefficients: 	[x] (see line 3 in csv file) 
Impedance values:			[ ]

Data files:					/_csv/mat_scene10_floor.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene10_seating.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene10_plaster.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene10_ceiling.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene10_stagePanels.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene10_structuredPlaster.csv
							
Image files:
							/_img/mat_scene10_ceiling.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene10_floor_1.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene10_floor_2.JPG
